title: Farmyard stories = better move on frog ...
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Dorothy Butler's Video Books". A video designed to encourage children to read and enjoy books. Ten different stories, many from well known books, are told by professional storytellers in a farmyard setting and have been selected for children aged one to five years old. The stories are: "Mrs. Mopple's washing line", "Sophie and Jack", "Better move on frog", "Teddy at the seaside", "Bookload of animals", "Mr. Ginger's potato", "Wilberforce goes on a picnic", "Ambo and the little elephant", "Peter Pipers at the wildlife park", "Hairy Mclary from Donaldson's dairy" Introduced by Dorothy Butler.
related_objects: Series; S00201; Dorothy Butler's Video Books; Active
